name: UpdateProductInfo
description:
Partially update product information in HubSpot CRM.

This tool updates specific properties of a product identified by `productId` in HubSpot CRM. It will override existing property values, and returning errors for read-only or non-existent properties. Use when you need to modify product attributes such as name, price, or description.

parameters.name: product_id
parameters.description: The internal object ID of the product to be updated. This identifies the specific product in HubSpot CRM for the update operation.

parameters.name: product_properties_update
parameters.description: JSON object with key-value pairs of product properties to update. Only existing properties can be updated. Pass empty strings to clear values.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: unique_property_name
parameters.description: The unique property name used to identify the product. It should be a string representing a property with unique values.

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

parameters.name: idProperty
parameters.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

value_schema.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
